messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
There's a memo on the desk.
{~C3}Officer Gucci is unlikely to{~N}be murdered. He apparently{~N}died naturally.
{~C3}But, medical records show{~N}Officer Gucci had no prior{~N}symptoms of heart disease.{~E}
{~C3}Product only available in{~N}selected areas of Silent Hill.
{~C3}Raw material is White Claudia,{~N}a plant peculiar to the region.
